CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name, 'Enabling Agreement' ) , LEFT( RecordType.Name , LEN( RecordType.Name ) - LEN(' Enabling Agreement' )) , LEFT( Existing_Base_Agreement__r.RecordType.Name , LEN( Existing_Base_Agreement__r.RecordType.Name ) - LEN(' Enabling Agreement' )) )
CustomField.label: Contract Format
